text: Furthermore, we found that hallmark sequences of the immunoglobulin superfamily (i.e., B cell receptors [BCRs], T cell receptors [TCRs] , and FcRc receptors), the cytoplasmic immunoreceptor tyrosine-based activation motif (ITAM) [44, 45] , are present in select teleost homologs (Fig. S2 in File S1).
